abstract: Egan Jones, the credit rating agency, told bondholders of the CIT Group to stand their ground and reject a sweetened debt exchange offer from the company as well as a new offer from Carl Icahn.
snippet: Egan Jones, the credit rating agency, told bondholders of the CIT Group to stand their ground and reject a sweetened debt exchange offer from the company as well as a new offer from Carl Icahn.
lead_paragraph: Egan-Jones, the credit rating agency, told bondholders of the CIT Group to stand their ground and reject a sweetened debt exchange offer from the company as well as a new offer from Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: As Icahn Pitches on CIT, Egan-Jones Urges Rejection
